title: Trying to Identify Soap Opera Font
content:
theres a certain font which i like but theres no where i can find it. It’s the font used for the opening credits intro of the mexican soap opera “Un Gancho al Corazon” hopefully someone can identify it, my suggestion would be to view the intro of “Un Gancho al Corazon” via youtube.

heres the link  
 [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U83Z0VQSbCs](http://web.archive.org/web/20081002010045/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=U83Z0VQSbCs "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U83Z0VQSbCs")

 [‹ Arena Stage and Invitrogen Logos - Have you seen this font they share?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081002010045/http:/typophile.com/node/49896 "Go to previous forum topic") [Content/Beauty Serif Font ID ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081002010045/http:/typophile.com/node/49889 "Go to next forum topic")
author: SolidusSnake215

comments.content: can anyone help me identify this font?

Hi Flavio,  
maybe a YouTube link is not the best way for providing a sample? ;-)  
No problem, here are a few screenshots:
